column4: Hello, i wanna compile a program from source in Maverick. Anybody can give me suggestion? What application I should compile?
I wanna learn compiling from source.
GNU Hello is a program?
? you can compile anything, really.. apt-get source $package will get you the source of any package and "dpkg-builddep" (I think) will get you the necessary dependencies.
compile hello, world.
just do "apt-get source" on anything, really...
compile hello, world.
i have done it.
great. Now you've learnt to compile.
then follow the instructions in the README or INSTALL file more closely.
i have done it many many times
Give me one example, a tarball easy to compile.
then either you haven't done it correctly or the instructinos are bad.
a program who dont need many dependencies...
yes the answer is i haven't done it correctly
you know what? You'd solve your problem much quicker if you actually told us *what* the problem is.. i.e. error messages or the like...
my general problems is: no such files or directories
why don't you just try for yourself and come back if you do have problems..?
i have done it for many times and fault at all, this is my  problems :) So i ask now :D
not a good approach.
Yes, it is true.
